summary: Ever been annoyed with the tedious task of mining? Well Turbo Pickaxe has got you covered!
descriptionHtml:
Turbo Pickaxe is a simple mod that basically makes mining a lot more tolerable without messing with the ore veins. Simply take out your pickaxe as a weapon, and strike the Ore vein to mine it!. Enjoy!

Pickaxe speed is dramatically improved!

(Pickaxe damage has been reduced to 0 to avoid cheating in combat!)
author: Sakotius
